title: A CONCURRENT RESOLUTION continuing the work of the Air Mobility and Aviation Economic Development Task Force by establishing the Aviation Economic Development Task Force.
subject: Aeronautics And Aviation
Economic Development
General Assembly
Legislative Research Commission
Task Forces, Legislative Branch
Transportation

abstracts.abstract: Direct the Legislative Research Commission to establish the Aviation Economic Development Task Force and direct it to study and make recommendations; establish membership and meetings; direct the task force to submit its findings and recommendations to the Legislative Research Commission by December 1, 2026.
